name: Collins Mbathi

services.title: Automation Testing
services.description: i test sofware and other tech products to ensure it meets strict requirements.

services.title: Development
services.description: In charge of developing and improving software and apps. This comprises software research, design, and development. Collaboration between analysts and computer engineers to achieve the proposed software application performance

services.title: Web Design
services.description: Design, which is sometimes misunderstood as the superficial process of creating, executing, or constructing a product's appearance, actually involves a lot more. It is a cross-functional task that entails market research, concept design, and technological research.

aboutpara:
Hi there! I'm Collins Mbathi, a Software Engineer ,Technical Writer and a community Advocate. I'm based in Nairobi, Kenya.

I have two years of experience writing  JavaScript code, and I've created  personal projects and excellent client websites, which some are used by the community to solve daily life problems. I also write articles that i talk about  developing applications, writing tests, integrating with CircleCI and other CI/CD platforms, and documenting.


Also as a Supporter of the community , i do talks and involve newbies in this world of tech , i served as a web event organizer at Google Developers Student Club  

Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

Figma,
Sanity.io,
React JS,
Next JS,
Node JS,
Express JS,
MongoDB,
Mysql,
Git,
 GitHub,
 Docker,
AWS Heroku,
Digital Ocean,

I'm actively looking for a new position as a Software Engineer and would appreciate being notified of any new openings.
